titleStmt.title: Pompey a tragœdy, acted with great applause.
Mort de Pompée. English
titleStmt.author: Corneille, Pierre, 1606-1684.
Philips, Katherine, 1631-1664.

notesStmt.note: Translation by Katherine Philips of: La mort de Pompée.
"Epilogue" (p. 62) is signed: Sir Edward Deering, Baronet.
Written by Pierre Corneille. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
